item.title: Style Guide
item.description: The Style Guide provides you with a set of standards for the writing and design of theme posts and pages, either for general use or for a specific publication, organization, or field. Images This theme supports regular image with or without caption, wide images with or without caption and full-width images with or without the caption. The examples provided below. A regular image with caption (by Rob Bye)
